items.description: The management expects future performance to be better, both in terms of order inflows and revenues

items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance shares in focus as profit zooms 54% YoY in Q4FY25
items.description: HSBC maintained a "Reduce" rating on Bajaj Housing Finance with a target price of Rs 100 per share

items.title: Axis Bank Q4 results due today: Dividend, fundraising, more; here's what to expect amid muted earnings
items.description: Axis Bank shares have risen over 7.4 percent in the past five days, and nearly 10 percent in the past one month. The stock has seen a sharp surge of nearly 13 percent in 2025 so far.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Nifty opens below 24300, Sensex down 200 pts; Tata Consumer, LTIMindtree down post Q4 results
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Stocks like Syngene International, Wendt India, Persistent Systems, Supreme Petrochem, 360 ONE WAM, Can Fin Homes, Rallis India, Tata Teleservices (Maharashtra), Tamilnad Mercantile Bank, Filatex India, Biocon, Niva Bupa Health Insurance Company, Spandana Sphoorty Financial, and Bajaj Finance will be in focus on April 24

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) extended their buying on the sixth day as they bought equities worth Rs 3332 crore on April 23. However, Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) continued selling on second day as they sold equities of Rs 1234 crore on the same day.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Bharti Airtel, Cummins India, M&M, L&T Finance, Escort Kubota, Emami, Astral and others on April 24?
items.description: The market could see some consolidation and profit booking in the upcoming sessions, though the overall trend remains positive. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Tata Consumer Products, BPCL, Adani Green Energy, Panacea Biotec, Thyrocare, Bajaj Housing, LTIMindtree in focus on 24 April
items.description: Stocks to watch, 24 Apr: Stocks like Syngene International, Wendt India, Supreme Petrochem, 360 ONE WAM, Can Fin Homes, Rallis India, Tata Teleservices (Maharashtra), Tamilnad Mercantile Bank, Filatex India, Biocon, Niva Bupa Health Insurance Company, Spandana Sphoorty Financial, and Bajaj Finance will be in focus on April 24.

items.title: Bulk & Block deals: Capri Global picks 1.1% stake in Synergy Green Industries on April 23
items.description: Atal Realtech saw heavy trading activity. Ravi Goyal and his HUF entity bought a total of 12.6 lakh shares at an average price of around Rs 15.9.

items.title: US stocks rise on hopes of US-China trade negotiations; Tech counters lead rally
items.description: The rally followed Trump’s remarks late Tuesday, suggesting a more conciliatory stance toward China. Acknowledging the current 145 percent tariff on Chinese imports as “very high"

items.title: Wall Street off to a flying start as Trump signals softer tone on Powell and China tariffs
items.description: Markets cheered Trump’s assurance that he has "no intention" of removing Fed Chair Jerome Powell, a notable climbdown after days of fiery rhetoric targeting the central bank head.

items.title: Persistent shares jump 3% after Q4 net profit rises 25% to Rs 396 crore, firm declares Rs 15 dividend
items.description: For the fourth quarter of FY25, the company reported a Total Contract Value (TCV) of $517.5 million and Annual Contract Value (ACV) of $350.2 million.

items.title: Ather Energy's top investors Tiger Global, GIC and founders set to ride home with multi-bagger returns
items.description: Co-founders Tarun Mehta and Swapnil Jain each hold a 6.81 percent stake, amounting to 2.06 crore shares. Their average acquisition price is estimated at Rs 43.27 per share, and their respective holdings post price band valued at roughly Rs 659 crore.

items.title: Baazar Style: Is this the next rising star in value retail space?
items.description: With consistent SSSG, an expanding private label portfolio, and strong store-level economics, Baazar Style stands out as a scalable and profitable value fashion retailer with deep regional presence

items.title: Agri Picks Report April 24, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Indian farmers have sown summer crops across 6.88 million hectares as of Friday, up 15.2% on year from 5.97 million hectares sown in the same period a year ago, according to data released by the agriculture ministry relased on Monday.

items.title: Lupin bags USFDA nod for Tolvaptan tablet, becomes exclusive first-to-file for the drug
items.description: Tolvaptan slows down the deterioration of kidney function in adults who are at risk of rapidly progressing autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD).

items.title: Buy Cyient DLM; target of Rs 621: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on Cyient DLM has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 621 in its research report dated April 24, 2025.

items.title: Buy AU Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 760: LKP Research
items.description: LKP Research is bullish on AU Small Finance Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 760 in its research report dated April 23, 2025.

items.title: Syngene shares plunge 10% following muted Q4 results and conservative FY26 outlook
items.description: CNBC-Awaaz cited a brokerage note that said Syngene's FY26 guidance is significantly below expectations

items.title: Samhi Hotels shares surge 7% as GIC set to acquire Rs 752-crore stake in firm's three subsidiaries
items.description: After the transaction closes, the company expects its debt to be reduced by nearly Rs 580 crore. This will have a positive impact of 15-20 percent on the company's net profit, Samhi added.

items.title: Reduce LTIMindtree; target of Rs 4680: Choice Equity Broking
items.description: Choice Equity Broking recommended reduce rating on LTIMindtree with a target price of Rs 4680 in its research report dated April 24, 2025.

items.title: Bajaj Finance shares in focus as board to consider stock split, bonus issue and dividend on April 29
items.description: Bajaj Finance share price: The blue-chip stock delivered over 35% year-to-date returns in 2025 so far and added over Rs 1.5 lakh crore to investor wealth

items.title: Thyrocare shares skyrocket 20% after profit, revenue see double-digit growth in Q4
items.description: Thyrocare Tech reported a 21.9 percent year-on-year increase in net profit, which stood at Rs 21.7 crore in Q4

items.title: Taking Stock: Seven-day rally snaps, sending Nifty below 24,300, HUL top index loser
items.description: HUL, Bharti Airtel, Eicher Motors, ICICI Bank, Eternal were among major losers on the Nifty, while gainers were IndusInd Bank, UltraTech Cement, Grasim Industries, Tata Motors, Dr Reddy's Labs.

items.title: Live: Nifty Snaps 7-Day Rally On F&O Expiry Day| HUL Slumps On Margin Worries| Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty Snaps Seven Day Upmove. Rangebound session on monthly expiry day. Broader markets snap winning streak. Breadth tilted in favour of losers. Pharma and metals in the green. FMCG, realty top losers. HUL Slumps On Margin Worries. Nifty gainers: Indusind, ultratech, grasim, DRL, Cipla. Nifty losers: HUL, Airtel, Eicher, ICICI, Eternal. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Motas as they break down the market action and share the stocks on their radar.

items.title: Bulls take breather: Nifty, Sensex snap 7-session winning streak on expiry day, FMCG stocks disappoint
items.description: Broader markets mirrored the weak trend. The Nifty Midcap 100 index slipped 0.2 percent, while the Nifty Smallcap 100 closed marginally lower, giving up slight gains after a sharp rally in recent sessions.
